Lab: 01 Hello World

  1. Make sure 01-hello-world.html runs and renders in the browser.
  2. Create a node under the body called <div id='container'> and render the output there.
  3. Past the following under body and render to the third paragraph (you don't need it, but there's a reference to jquery on the page if you want to use it). MDN CSS Reference
<div>
    <p class='first'></p>
    <p class='second'></p>
    <p class='third'></p>
</div>
  1. Create two seperate ractive instances that render different templates to two different nodes
  2. Try an inline template instead of an element selector
